thread.title: Belarusian writer Svetlana Alexievich wins Nobel Prize in Literature
thread.title_full: Belarusian writer Svetlana Alexievich wins Nobel Prize in Literature - San Francisco Chronicle

author: John McMurtrie
title: Belarusian writer Svetlana Alexievich wins Nobel Prize in Literature
text:
Photo: Ulf Andersen / Getty Images Svetlana Alexievich in Lyon, France, in 2014. Svetlana Alexievich in Lyon, France, in 2014.
Belarusian writer Svetlana Alexievich has won this year’s Nobel Prize in Literature. Svetlana Alexievich in Lyon, France, in 2014. Svetlana Alexievich in Lyon, France, in 2014.
Belarusian writer Svetlana Alexievich has won this year’s Nobel Prize in Literature.
